description: Descubre los mejores hoteles en Tenerife, Spain. Encuentra ofertas exclusivas y alojamientos de lujo.

hotels.vendor_name: Royal Hideaway Corales Beach, part of Barceló Hotel Group - Adults Only
hotels.title: Adults-Only Tenerife Resort near Costa Adeje with Michelin-Starred Dining & Onsite Spa
hotels.description: Settle for nothing with a picture-perfect stay at the Royal Hideaway Corales Beach, a jewel nestled in the heart of Tenerife's Costa Adeje. This adults-only sanctuary has it all. Savour Michelin-starred dining options with San Hô offering Japanese-Peruvian fusion and El Rincon de Juan Carlos serving up rich and flavoursome plates. Unwind at the wellness centre with holistic treatments backed by Ayurvedic principles, and take in breathtaking ocean views.

seo.title: Hoteles en Tenerife - Spain Hotels & Travel Guide 2024
seo.description: Encuentra los mejores hoteles en Tenerife, Spain con ofertas exclusivas. Reserva tu escapada perfecta con hasta 60% de descuento.
